markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Soaring Wings](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2216)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Wings, normally tattooed on the upper back, enable you to fly when activated. The visual manifestation is typically a slight glow or ripple in the ink, but some artists make it so the tattoo creates a glowing aura or lines of light in the shape of wings.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** For 10 minutes, you gain a fly Speed equal to either your land Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Soaring Wings
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 750 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Soaring Wings (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 3,800 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You can activate the tattoo once per hour.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 19"
pfs="Standard"
>
Soaring Wings (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 38,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You can activate the tattoo any number of times, and the effect lasts until you Dismiss the activation.
name: Soaring Wings (Major)
